title.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, July 20, 1895. More Contributions for St. John Cantius Parish Fair

div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, July 20, 1895. MORE CONTRIBUTIONS FOR ST. JOHN CANTIUS PARISH FAIR

body.p: Of the twenty-seven persons who made contributions for the coming St. John Cantius Parish fair, ten persons contributed twenty dollars in cash, the largest single contribution being ten dollars; the remaining contributions were in merchandise. Anthony Scherman donated a silver watch and chain.
The Fair Committee wishes to extend hearty thanks to the donors.
